1.content:
Which character will you follow?

Millie Lawson: (24) A journalist from the Daily Planet in Metropolis who gets suspicious about Arkham City. Hugo Strange, the warden of Arkham City, fears Millie will find something she's not suppose to. As a result, Millie gets a free ticket to Arkham City.

Richard Tyler: (35) A local Gotham City politician who wants to shut down Arkham City for occupying too much area in Gotham and unmoral punishment. Richard gets to Arkham City to keep opposition quiet

Peter Young: (20) Brother of Penelope Young, a doctor killed in Arkham Asylum during Joker's escape there, Peter searches the remains of Arkham Asylum to find out what really happened to his sister. Strange finds Peter searching the asylum and sends him to Arkham City, fearing Peter knows too much.

Teresa Sharp: (18) Daughter of Gotham City's mayor, Quincy Sharp. Teresa is neglected by her father due to his work and issues with Arkham City. After Quincy has a disagreement with Hugo Strange, Strange kidnaps Teresa to Arkham City in spite.
1.title: Which Character?

13.content:
"On your feet prisoner!" a guard yelled, dragging Peter up by the collar of his shirt giving him a chance to find his footing. He was roughly pulled along, forced out into the cold night air. it was freezing, way colder than what should have been normal for the season, but Peter had heard rumors of Dr. Freeze being seen within the city, but he didn't know if they had been true, but this bitter cold seemed to confirm some sort of strange weather phenomena. Peter stumbled a couple times as he was led through a narrow chain fenceway, it was clear for the most part save for a few inmates who were giving him some very lethal stares and he quickly looked away inciting laughter from them. "I bet this guy won't even last a week!" one of the inmates said as Peter walked by, and he shivered, the thought of dying in such a place without finding out what happened to his sister filled him with dread. "A week? I bet he won't even last through the night"

Peter was scared stiff. How did a night trespassing the ruins of Arkham Asylum get him into Arkham City? This was the last place he needed to be. How's he going to find out about his sister's death if he's in a secluded area of Gotham City? Before Peter could come up with a plan, he heard the clanging of fences from the criminals climbing over them. The next thing Peter knew, he was dragged to the ground beaten up by random thugs piling up on him. He turned to the TYGER guards. All they did was chuckle and ignore the situation. Every single punch and kick made Peter's vision grow darker in unconsciousness.

Peter was awakened by a yelling voice, "Order! Order in the court!" Peter found himself lying on the floor what appeared to be the old courthouse that was abandoned even before Arkham City. He turned from his spot and someone yelled, "Hey, boss! He's up!"
"Bring him here!" said the yelling voice. Peter felt himself being pulled up by his collar for the second time since arriving and he shook his head to clear the fog in his brain and he looked up staring into the disfigured eyes of Two-Face and he let out a small gasp of shock and fear."Well well what do we have here? a new recruit? or perhaps another prisoner to execute" the way Two-Face spoke confused Peter, but he knew better than to speak, this man was crazy and highly dangerous. "So tell us, what brought you here, from the look of you we can tel you're no thug, so there must be a reason." Peter bit back a cry for help knowing that it was completely useless in a situation like this and he tooka breath before speaking. "I.. I was thrown in here by Strange.. after... after he caught me on the old arkham island.." Two-Face pulled out the infamous coin that he was so famous for. "And what were you doing on the island?" Peter felt his breathing starting to lose control. "I...I was trying to find out... what happened to my sister.... she... she had been a doctor working there when.. the Joker took over the asylum.." Peter gritted his teeth at the Joker's name, it filled him with a bitter anger.

"Joker, huh?" said Two Face, "Yeah, I know about his invasion plan. I also heard he hasn't been the same since then." Two Face looked directly at Peter. "Tell me, do you hate the clown?" Without any hesitation, Peter said, "Yes." Two Face then juggled his coin between his fingers in Peter's face. "Let's see if that hatred will get you anywhere." He tossed his coin into the air with his thumb. Everyone in the room held their breaths as the coin flipped through the air and landed in Two Faces' hand. Two Face looked at the coin and smirked. Peter was scared to find out what he was smirking about. "Looks like you're going to go far, kid." He then turned his attention to his crew. "This court is adjourned!"
13.title: Peter Young

info.brief_description: You are in the infamous Arkham City from the game, Batman: Arkham City. What will happen?
info.description:
You are in the notorious Gotham City facility, Arkham City. Based on the video game, Batman: Arkham City, you are surrounded by criminals that Blackgate Prison and Arkham Asylum failed to contain. What will you do? Will you escape? Will you take this opportunity to claim Arkham City for yourself? Will you stay in the shadows and try to survive with other unlucky inmates like you? The choice is yours.

You can make the story follow the game if you wish but you are not required.

Please keep it clean. You know what I mean by that.
info.pretty_title: Arkham City: Escape, Conquer, or Survive
